name: Early Pearl
description: Early Pearl is a sativa bred by Sensi Seeds. These sturdy buds have the solidity of an indica, making them great breeders for adding toughness and stability to offspring. Alternatively, effects are notably sativa with an unmistakable vibrance and vigor optimal for daytime use. Heavy yields can be achieved indoors and outdoors, with a flowering time around 9 weeks.
descriptionPlain: Early Pearl is a sativa bred by Sensi Seeds. These sturdy buds have the solidity of an indica, making them great breeders for adding toughness and stability to offspring. Alternatively, effects are notably sativa with an unmistakable vibrance and vigor optimal for daytime use. Heavy yields can be achieved indoors and outdoors, with a flowering time around 9 weeks.

highlightedReviews.text: Great strain. If there's ever been a strain to help me take on a stressful day with a positive attitude, it's this one. I am more inclined to converse, I do get hungry and I maintain a relaxed demeanor. A well deserved 5 stars from me ðŸ’š

growInfo.growNotes:
Highest yields are achieved by moving plants indoors to outdoors at the end of winter, placed in direct sunlight a few weeks after the spring equinox.
	Leave plenty of space between plants to allow for stretching and growth
